page.title: 16Secondary Schools-Gloucester
page.content: {Denmark High School}is an all girl school.It was built about 100 years ago.It is a very big building and has many rooms.It is for 11-18 year old girls.Number on roll September 1984-545.Number to be admitted in September 1985 -60.Their playing field is not part of the building because when it was built there wasn't any grass and the nearest stretch of grass is down Landsdown Road.That means that they have to walk a long way for their games. {Oxstalls}is an all boys school but it is not a bit like Denmark, because Oxstalls is a modern school.Due to falling rolls it will only have 38 admitted in September.They have a 400 m running track.They have many clubs like a break dancing,chess,computer a few more.There are plans to merge Denmark and Oxstalls Schools.
